item.title: Benefits of a Morning Routine
item.description: Get a proactive rather than reactive start to your day.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s a list of all the books I’ve read since 2017. Bolded books have had a notable impact on my life, or were amazing reads. Self Help Thinking Fast and Slow - Daniel Kahneman Kahneman describes how our conscious and unconscious minds influence our behavior. This is the most comprehensive book I’ve read on how our mind works. Thereâ€™s a lot of research cited in this book. It touches on everything from cognitive biases to how conscious thinking affects your mood.
